Name: Beneficent
Title: Yaoyao: Beneficent
Source: Reward for inviting Yaoyao to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Beneficent
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1704]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1704] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S17042]</color> once.
When <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117041]</color> is created by your $[A1704], who has this card equipped, and it has only 1 $[K3] remaining, it deals +1 DMG and healing is increased by 1.
(You must have $[A1704] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C117041.Name: Yuegui: Throwing Mode
C117041.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K107], heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K107.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>
K107.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
